entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:18 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 1:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
